name: Dodge The Creeps (DrRobotronic)
description:
My first project in Godot! This is simply the results of completing a beginner tutorial, I intend to share finished tutorials and demos here for free to document my progress. If I create anything that I think has real value I may open up donations but for now this is all free.

To play, avoid touching the enemies! The longer you survive the higher your score.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys

Start Game - Enter or click Start with mouse

UPDATE:

  •  Fixed background music, it now loops!
  • Added high score feature
